Body:
l = lookup.TemplateLookup(module_directory=module_base)
l.put_string('test',
    """
                <%!
                    callcount = [0]
                %>
                <%def name="foo()" cached="True" cache_type='dbm'>
                    this is foo
                    <%
                    callcount[0] += 1
                    %>
                </%def>

                ${foo()}
                ${foo()}
                ${foo()}
                callcount: ${callcount}
        """
    )
m = self._install_mock_cache(l.get_template('test'))
assert result_lines(l.get_template('test').render()) == ['this is foo',
    'this is foo', 'this is foo', 'callcount: [1]']
eq_(m.kwargs, {'type': 'dbm'})
